entry.title: Thursday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Rain showers or drizzle and a few flurries changing to snow this evening. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
